gui.addsynthcore.jei_description.scythes: Scythes are used to cut leaves off of trees very quickly. They are mined as though you mined them by hand.
gui.addsynthcore.jei_description.music_b: Press keys on your keyboard to change notes. Arrange notes on the grid, and press PLAY to hear the current Music Box. Activate a Music Box with a redstone signal. When one Music Box is done playing, it will search in the NEXT direction for another Music Box and play that one.
gui.addsynthcore.jei_description.music_s: The Music Sheet can be used to copy Music Box data to other Music Boxes. Right-click a Music Box to copy data. When the Music Sheet has data, right-click Music Boxes to paste. Right-clicking without looking at a Music Box will clear the data.
gui.addsynthcore.music_sheet.copy: Music data copied to Music Sheet.
gui.addsynthcore.music_sheet.paste: Music Sheet pasted to Music Box.
advancements.addsynthcore.root.title: ADDSynthCore
advancements.addsynthcore.root.descripti: Core mod required for all of ADDSynth's mods.
advancements.addsynthcore.scythe.title: Scythe
